lead_paragraph: A request from a Goldman Sachs trader, Fabrice Tourre, to have a federal judge in New York throw out the Securities and Exchange Commission's lawsuit against him has been rejected, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Goldman Sachs trader Fabrice Tourre's request to throw out the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's lawsuit against him was rejected by a federal judge in New York, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Tourre's Request to Have Suit Thrown Out

abstract: Goldman Sachs trader Fabrice Tourre's request to throw out the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's lawsuit against him was rejected by a federal judge in New York, Bloomberg News reported.
